info.title: MoodPatrol - Emotion Detection from Text
info.description:
MoodPatrol offers developers a tool to analyze texts and extract the underlying emotions. Go beyond simple sentiment analysis and enrich your apps to make them more human-centered.

Easily detect Plutchik's 8 basic emotions and a wide variety of finer emotions from your texts. Our API uses sophisticated text analysis to find emotion patterns in text. Create more human-centered apps by understanding how your users feel.

post.description: Detect the emotions from the given text
